sen.j: 役行者霊蹟札所（えんのじょうしゃれいせきふだしょ）は、修験道の開祖とされる役小角ゆかりの三十六寺社の霊場巡礼である。
sen.e: En no Gyoja Reiseki Fudasho indicates the pilgrimage of the 36 reijo (sacred places) in 36 temples and shrines, related to En no Gyoja who is said founded Shugendo (Japanese mountain asceticism-shamanism incorporating Shinto and Buddhist concepts).

En no Gyoja Reiseki Fudasho indicates the pilgrimage of the thirty-six reijo (sacred places) in thirty-six temples and shrines, related to En no Gyoja who is said to have founded Shugendo (Japanese mountain asceticism-shamanism incorporating Shinto and Buddhist concepts).

sen.j: 役行者1300年遠忌を機にして設立された。
sen.e: These reijo were established commemorating the 1300th anniversary of his death

sen.j: 通常の霊場巡礼と異なり、札所番号は定められていない。
sen.e: Contrary to ordinary pilgrimage to reijo, no number is given to the reijo where pilgrimage is to be made.
